verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> above הַגִּתִּ֗ית <WH1665> upon Gittith מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> O LORD אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ <WH113> our Lord מָֽה־ <WH4100> How אַדִּ֣יר <WH117> how excellent שִׁ֭מְךָ <WH8034> [is] thy name בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in all the earth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Who תְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> who hast set ה֝וֹדְךָ֗ <WH1935> thy glory עַל־ <WH5921> above הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> above the heavens

מִפִּ֤י <WH6310> Out of the mouth עֽוֹלְלִ֨ים ׀ <WH5768> of babes וְֽיֹנְקִים֮ <WH3243> and sucklings יִסַּ֪דְתָּ֫ <WH3245> hast thou ordained עֹ֥ז <WH5797> strength לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> Because צוֹרְרֶ֑יךָ <WH6887> because of thine enemies לְהַשְׁבִּ֥ית <WH7673> that thou mightest still א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <WH341> the enemy וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃ <WH5358> and the avenger

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When אֶרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> When I consider שָׁ֭מֶיךָ <WH8064> thy heavens מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> the work אֶצְבְּעֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH676> of thy fingers יָרֵ֥חַ <WH3394> the moon וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים <WH3556> and the stars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which כּוֹנָֽנְתָּה׃ <WH3559> which thou hast ordained

מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <WH582> What is man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that תִזְכְּרֶ֑נּוּ <WH2142> that thou art mindful וּבֶן־ <WH1121> of him? and the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> of man כִּ֣י <WH3588> that תִפְקְדֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH6485> that thou visitest

וַתְּחַסְּרֵ֣הוּ <WH2637> lower מְּ֭עַט <WH4592> For thou hast made him a little מֵאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> than the angels וְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> him with glory וְהָדָ֣ר <WH1926> and honour תְּעַטְּרֵֽהוּ׃ <WH5849> and hast crowned

תַּ֭מְשִׁילֵהוּ <WH4910> Thou madest him to have dominion בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> over the works יָדֶ֑יךָ <WH3027> of thy hands כֹּ֝ל <WH3605> all שַׁ֣תָּה <WH7896> thou hast put תַֽחַת־ <WH8478> under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> all [things] under his feet
צֹנֶ֣ה <WH6792> All sheep וַאֲלָפִ֣ים <WH504> and oxen כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> All וְ֝גַ֗ם <WH1571> and also בַּהֲמ֥וֹת <WH929> yea and the beasts שָׂדָֽי׃ <WH7704> of the field

צִפּ֣וֹר <WH6833> The fowl שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> of the air וּדְגֵ֣י <WH1709> and the fish הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea עֹ֝בֵ֗ר <WH5674> [and whatsoever] passeth through אָרְח֥וֹת <WH734> the paths יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> of the seas
יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD אֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ <WH113> our Lord מָֽה־ <WH4100> How אַדִּ֥יר <WH117> how excellent שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> [is] thy name בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in all the earth
